title: 79 Best Last-Minute Amazon Gifts for Men in 2024
description: Shop design-forward presents that’ll arrive ahead of the holidays
author: Nashia Baker
excerpt: From premium cookware to cool headphones, these design-forward presents are the best last-minute Amazon gifts for men, and they’ll arrive ahead of the holidays
text: The truth is, shopping for the best last-minute Amazon gifts for men gets a bad rap. As an online destination with what feels like every item under the sun, many shoppers can be left wondering what unique gifts there could possibly be for the guys in their lives. And for those browsing at the eleventh hour, it might seem even harder to find something special that’ll deliver before holiday get-togethers. We’re here to change these narratives. Our curated list of Amazon gifts features luxe finds like designer fashion for men with expensive taste, editor-approved presents for the design enthusiasts in your family or friend group, and everything in-between. What’s more, you can get all of the above delivered in quick fashion, if you’re one of the many with an Amazon Prime membership.Scroll below for our gift guide on the 79 best last-minute Amazon gifts for men that’ll arrive in the nick of time.Our Top Picks:Best Christmas Gift: Hugo Boss “Number One” Eau de Toilette, $80Best Design-Forward Gift: Hisense 55-Inch Canvas TV, $798Best White Elephant Gift: Galison Frank Lloyd Wright Geometric Artwork Puzzle, $19Best Luxury Gift: Giuseppe Zanotti Ludhovic Leather Boots, $895Best Self-Care Gift: Bevel Skin Care Set, $41Best Fitness Gift: Bowflex Adjustable Dumbbells, $399Best Foodie Gift: Made In Enameled Cast Iron Dutch Oven, $249Best Tech Gift: Apple AirPods, $169Best Birthday Gift: Kanars Whiskey Glasses, $36Galison Frank Lloyd Wright 500-Piece Book Box PuzzleImmerse him in the world of art by challenging him to complete this 500-piece Frank Lloyd Wright geometric artwork. Not to mention it makes a great white elephant gift for design enthusiasts.Apple AirPods 4AirPods are a classic gift that’ll keep on giving for someone who is always on the go—especially if he’s prone to losing them, an extra set will be much appreciated. Thanks to noise-cancelling technology, he can block out background noise as he listens to his favorite music and podcasts. Plus, people can listen uninterrupted for five hours straight on a full charge and for 30 hours with the case.Bartesian Cocktail Making MachineRather than making a drink the old-fashioned (pun intended) way, this cocktail maker will whip it up, stat. Like a pod for a Keurig coffee maker, all he has to do is add a cocktail capsule into this device, select a strength, and press “mix.” P.S. This useful gift will come in handy for an at-home happy hour this holiday season.Alpha Grillers Instant Read Meat ThermometerThe perfect gift for the person whose time is best spent over the grill, this meat thermometer will ensure their food is thoroughly cooked with a temperature reading in just three seconds.UGG Men's South Bay Low SneakerTurn to classic sneakers for gifting. To our surprise, Ugg has a whole assortment of them, like this sleek pair with a leather upper and suede overlays that can be dressed up or down.Mirakel Neck Massager with HeatA deep tissue massage will be just moments away when he uses this electric back and neck massager. Designed to deliver ultimate rest and relaxation, it moves in two directions, has three speed modes, and includes a built-in heat function for a customizable treatment.AeroGarden Harvest 2.0 Indoor GardenGreen thumbs will get a kick out of this countertop garden. It’s powered with an LED light and watering system that’ll allow him to grow up to six different plants—from veggies to herbs year-round.POLO RALPH LAUREN Crew Socks (Pack of 3)Now that the holiday season is here, it’s time to quickly round up the stocking stuffers that make A+ presents. One practical idea is this pair of Polo Ralph Lauren crew-length socks. Even though they’re lightweight, they have a warm, soft feel to keep the recipient comfortable year-round.Giuseppe Zanotti Ludhovic BootsPsst: For those who don’t already know, Amazon is chock-full of luxury fashion to shop. Tucked away in this hidden storefront is this modern pair of Giuseppe Zanotti leather boots that’ll upgrade his footwear game all winter.All-Clad D3 Cookware Set (7 Piece)If his cookware set is looking a little worse for wear, he can try out this All-Clad stainless steel assortment for size. Complete with fry pans, stockpots, and more, it’s a great gift for foodies to make a full-course meal. Plus, its high-quality three-ply construction is oven-safe up to 600 degrees Fahrenheit for a warp-resistant finish.Ember Smart CupOdds are he’s not a fan of the room temperature coffee he intended to drink hours beforehand (who is?). This sleek Ember cup can keep his java at the same hot temperature (between 120 to 145 degrees Fahrenheit) for up to 90 minutes at a time or all day long when it’s set on its charging coaster.Hugo Boss Fougère CologneThis Hugo Boss fragrance has the makings for his new signature scent. A blend between nutmeg, cardamom, patchouli, and sandalwood gives it a fresh and vibrant aroma.Made In Enameled Cast Iron Dutch OvenFoodies can make their signature dish for years to come with the help of this heirloom-worthy Dutch oven. The enameled cast-iron cookware is designed with strong heat retention and even circulation in mind to help make stews and tender meats to perfection.Herschel Novel Duffel BagCalling all jet-setters: This duffel bag will carry him from one destination to the next with ease thanks to its versatile straps and built-in shoe compartment. This earns bonus points in our book for its eco-conscious build, with its fabric made entirely of recycled water bottles.Apple Watch Series 9 [GPS + Cellular 41mm]If you’re in search of a smartwatch with all the best bells and whistles for him, turn your attention to this Apple Series 9 watch. Its S9 chip gives it one of the brightest, fastest displays. He can track his wellness with built-in sensors designed to report on his physical and mental health. Plus, he can make calls and send messages without having his phone handy.Theragun Prime PlusAches and pains are bound to creep up, especially if he’s a fitness fanatic. This massage gun can help relieve them with its rotating percussion arm and ergonomic grip for personalized muscle treatments.KODAK Mini Shot Retro 4PASS Instant Digital Camera & Photo PrinterLights, camera, action: He’ll capture every moment in an instant with this digital polaroid camera. It comes with over 60 cartridge sheets to create unique prints he’ll cherish.Yeti Hopper M Series Backpack CoolerOutdoorsy types can take this Yeti cooler backpack on all of their adventures. It’s spacious enough to hold nearly 20 cans at a time and it’s built with strong insulation to keep items at temperature for hours on end.Kanars Old Fashioned Whiskey Glasses (Set of 4)Whether he enjoys a mixed drink or bourbon on the rocks, these whiskey glasses will be a welcome gift. Available in a set of four, he can toast with his favorite people and keep the glasses protected in the gift box when they’re not in use.Ooni Volt Indoor & Outdoor Pizza OvenFor the guy who can’t go without a fresh slice, help him transform his kitchen into a personal pizzeria with this electric pizza oven on his countertop. The gadget is manufactured to heat to 850 degrees Fahrenheit in about 20 minutes and make a fresh pie in just over a minute.Vilebrequin Linen ShirtHe can’t go wrong with a simple button-down, and this luxe linen shirt is proof. Designed by Vilebrequin, this long-sleeve is made to take him back in time to evoke the spirit of 1971 St. Tropez.Beats Pill Portable Bluetooth SpeakerCompact and perfectly portable, this Beats Bluetooth speaker includes a lanyard so he can easily carry it around. It’s compatible with Apple and Android devices for simple pairing, and thanks to its 24-hour battery life, he can also enjoy all-day music play.Bevel Skin Care SetHere’s a skin-care set that’ll help him invest in his self-care routine day in and day out. Bevel’s collection of face and beard wash, face gel, and exfoliating pads are all formulated with nourishing ingredients like aloe vera and vitamin C specifically to care for men’s skin. The brand notes that each product is well-suited for all skin types to help remedy common issues like bumps and discoloration.Courant Catch:3 Wireless Phone Charging TrayElevate his at-home charging station with this sleek wireless charger, available in leather and linen. It’s compatible with a range of devices like Apple, Android, Google, and LG and features a catchall design to help hold other must-haves like his glasses.Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water BottleWhen it comes to shopping for a water bottle, Owala should be at the top of your list. The brand is popular for its dozens of colors to choose from, built-in straw, and double-wall insulation designed to keep drinks cold for nearly 24 hours.BowFlex SelectTech 552 Adjustable DumbbellsFor the guy who loves staying active, add versatility to his workout with these adjustable dumbbells. With the simple turn of the dial, he can adjust the weight of the dumbbells from 5 to 52 pounds to tackle strength training.Norelco Philips Multi Groomer All-in-One TrimmerGrooming just got a whole lot easier: This all-in-one trimmer kit has 13 pieces made to cut his facial and ear hair, as well as the hair, you know, on his head. The self-sharpening blades won’t require blade oil to maintain their quality, and the hour-long battery life can help him trim continuously.Amazon eGift CardDon’t underestimate the power of a good gift card. Men who like shopping for themselves will appreciate this digital Amazon gift card they can spend with abandon. Added perk: Amazon gift cards never expire, so he can take his time picking out everything he wants to buy on the mega-retailer.Calvin Klein Cotton Classics V Neck T-Shirt (Set of 3)Here’s a set of T-shirts that’ll always be in style. This Calvin Klein three-pack is made with a cool V-neck silhouette and breathable cotton material for comfortable yet stylish all-day wear.Brooklinen Super Plush RobeInstead of booking a spa day, he can sport this plush Brooklinen robe to enjoy ultimate comfort from home. Features like wide adjustable cuffs and a tie belt will help him customize his fit as he unwinds.Netvue by Birdfy Smart Bird FeederIs he ready to take his bird-watching hobby to new heights? This solar-powered smart bird feeder is equipped with a camera that can identify nearly 6,000 species that fly by and deliver shots and videos of them to his smartphone.D.S. & Durga Big Sur After Rain CandleWith the lighting of this wick, he’ll be transported to the West Coast with scents reminiscent of Big Sur after a rain shower. Think notes of eucalyptus leaf, wet wood, and magnolia.Alessi Pulcina Stovetop Coffee MakerCoffee-shop-level brews will be at his fingertips with this stunning espresso maker. Not only is the boiler manufactured to make espresso just right, but its aesthetically pleasing build also makes it a standout in any design-enthusiast’s kitchen.Driftaway Coffee Explorer Box, 5 Pack Coffee Tasting KitSpeaking of coffee, he can enjoy an assortment between light and dark roasts to kickstart his day, courtesy of Driftaway Coffee. The tasting pack includes five packs of whole fresh-roasted beans, all with hidden labels for an authentic tasting experience.Smeg 2 Slice ToasterThis trendy toaster merges form and function to make his breakfast spread.Fellow Stagg EKG Electric Gooseneck KettleTea time: This Fellow electric kettle is designed to heat water to an exact temperature degree and has an ergonomic spout that allows for precise pours. He can steep his tea or create a next-level cup of pour-over coffee to his liking.Ray-Ban RB3016 Clubmaster Square SunglassesA cool pair of sunglasses are essential in any guy’s arsenal of accessories. Case in point: These Ray-Bans. Their slightly square shape and dozen-plus frame and lens colors speak to Old Hollywood style that can easily elevate any look.Hisense 55-Inch Class QLED 4K S7N CanvasTVWho said home technology can’t be decor? This Canvas TV delivers the best of both worlds, as it works as a standard TV to stream your favorite movies and shows and a high-end art display when used in art mode.Arcade1Up PAC-Man Plus Deluxe Arcade MachineWith 14 classic games, like Pac-Man and Galaga, the lifelong gamer in your life is set to create an arcade from home with this console. They can battle it out with gamers around the world with access to Wi-Fi leaderboards.Dyson OnTrac Over Ear Wireless HeadphonesDyson might be known for everything from its powerful cordless vacuums to hair-styling tools, but its cool over-ear headphones are just as worth the hype. They boast eight noise-cancelling microphones (just double tap the outer cap to block out unwanted sounds) and up to 55 hours straight of music-listening on a full charge.INIU Slim Portable ChargerBuilt for Android or iPhone, this slim portable charger is designed to keep his devices charged when he’s en route to his next stop. In fact, the manufacturer notes that it can charge batteries nearly 80% in one hour.iRobot Roomba Vacuum 2 Essential RobotThis cordless robot vacuum will be a life saver for the guys who always put cleaning at the end of their to-do lists. It’s made to do all the heavy lifting for him by mapping out his space with built-in sensors for its cleaning navigation. Thanks to the compact profile, the vacuum can get in hard-to-reach places and powerfully clean carpets and hard floors with its three-stage system.Amazon Kindle Paperwhite (16 GB)Here’s a gift bookworms will consider a treat. Thanks to its lightweight build, the new Amazon Kindle will allow them to read all of their favorite novels without the hassle of lugging them all around. It’s also designed to turn pages 25% faster than standard Kindles and has a glare-free display no matter the lighting.Truff Gourmet Hot Sauce Sampler PackAs the saying goes, variety is the spice of life. Make this a reality when you give him these hot sauces infused with ripe chili peppers, agave nectar, and black and white truffles.Carhartt Men's Knit Cuffed BeanieBad hair day? No problem. This beanie will disguise his do and keep him warm with its knit material this winter.Alpha Industries MA-1 Bomber Flight JacketHe can layer up in style this season with this bomber jacket. It’s packed with plenty of pockets to keep his essentials handy and five neutral colors to fit in his closet.The GO-to Plain Toe Oxford by Cole HaanThis classic pair of Oxford shoes doesn't skimp on comfort. He can take on the day with the EVA midsole designed to give each step strong cushioning.Loftie Alarm ClockRise and shine: The Loftie alarm clock is an AD-favorite, and we’re confident it’ll be his favorite soon too. It’s equipped with a dimmable display, nightlight, two-phase alarm, and custom content like guided meditations that can play on the device.Scotch Porter Conditioning Beard Balm and Beard ConditionerMen with beards can keep their facial hair moisturized and hydrated with the help of this balm and conditioner duo. Backed with nourishing ingredients like aloe vera and shea butter, this beard care kit is also formulated with inviting notes like musk and amber so his facial hair will feel as good as it smells.Brightland The Artist CapsuleMen who love experimenting with new ingredients can take their pick from a variety of cold-pressed olive oils: Ardor, Rosette, Lucid, and Arise. Each one is made with olives grown on small California-based family farms and include a variety of standout flavors like chili and basil.Apple AirTagFor all of the forgetful guys in your life, an Apple AirTag will help them track down their lost items. Its one-tap setup can allow him to connect an AirTag to his iPhone or iPad effortlessly and use the Find My app to find his belongings.ASNEY Upgraded Magnetic Chess SetSure, there are plenty of game systems on the market, but few can beat the classics like chess. This set will make gaming even easier with the magnetic board and pieces to keep them from shifting during play. Added bonus: The board is foldable and comes with slots to stash pieces for streamlined storage.Blackstone 1883 Original GriddleWhether it’s Father’s Day or tailgating season, this Blackstone griddle will help him make some of his favorite BBQ recipes with ease. Its surface is spacious enough to make nearly 20 burgers at a time, and its add-ons like side shelves will store his seasonings and keep grill tools within arm’s reach.Whiskey Chilling Stones (Set of 6) by R.O.C.K.S.In the eyes of a whiskey enthusiast, there are probably few things worse than a watered down drink. He’ll keep his bourbon cold with these chilling stones without impacting its flavor.Our Place Wonder OvenSometimes kitchen appliances can be an eyesore, but that’s not the case with Our Place’s toaster oven. He can add design appeal to his space while taking a hands-off approach to cooking with its six included presets: air frying, toasting, roasting, baking, reheating, and broiling.Jack Black Clean & Cool Body SetEven if his self-care routine simply consists of taking a long shower after a tiring day, it’ll be all the more soothing when you gift him Jack Black’s cool and clean body-care set. It includes a body wash that’s formulated for use from head to toe, as well as body lotion and deodorant, all filled with crisp scents.Peloton Indoor Exercise BikeAnother great way to ramp up his fitness journey, the Peloton bike offers an all-access membership ($44/mo) to tune into classes geared towards his exercise goals. Or he can tackle workouts on his own while using the bike to stream shows, live sports, and more with Peloton Entertainment.Solo Stove Bonfire 2.0 with StandWith the temperatures dropping outside, a personal bonfire will be a treat to enjoy the great outdoors with friends and family. This one is smoke-free, so he can focus on enjoying the flames instead of tending to excessive ashes blowing around. We’re not mad at its stainless-steel build that’ll help it mesh in nearly any modern outdoor setup.Architectural Digest at 100: A Century of StyleWhat’s a gift guide from AD without our coffee table book to help him reenvision his own space? In this look into the last 100 years of style, he’ll get endless inspiration from the homes of some of the world’s most private celebrities, like Barack and Michelle Obama, David Bowie, and Diana Vreeland, and take a peek into the works of industry-leading designers and architects like Frank Lloyd Wright and India Mahdavi.Ninja BN401 Nutri Pro Compact Personal BlenderFrom delicious juices to smoothies, this personal blender is powerful enough to make all of the above. Great for guys who are constantly on the move, the blending bowl doubles as a cup to take on the go.Buffy 100% Eucalyptus Lyocell Duvet CoverA cozy night’s rest is just moments away, as this eucalyptus duvet cover is made to feel soft and breathable to the touch. It’s eco-conscious all the way down to the dyes to make it, including natural ingredients like turmeric and rose petals.HOTO Electric Screwdriver Tool SetWith must-haves like pliers and screwdrivers, these tools are a gift set that would be especially helpful for someone who just moved into a new house. Its minimalist design is made to blend in with the rest of his home essentials so it’d make a perfect housewarming gift.Frigidaire Retro Mini Fridge CoolerThis mini fridge will be a much-appreciated gift in his den for a couple of reasons. One: It's big enough to hold about six cans at a time. Two: Its retro design will add a vintage touch to his space.Leather Journal Gift SetEven in the age of digital media, there’s nothing quite like putting your thoughts down on paper. If the man in your life knows the feeling, gift him this leather notebook so he can journal and jot down his everyday tasks.MVMT Men’s WatchIf he likes to keep track of time the old-fashioned way but he also likes modern style, we’re here to present this elevated watch. It keeps track of time by hour, minute, and second hands while delivering contemporary flare with its slim, minimalist design.Serman Brands Front Pocket WalletWallets are something we use all the time but hardly ever replace. If he can relate, give him this minimalist leather wallet that comes with front and interior pockets and a money clip for easy access to cash and cards.Texere Bath Towel SetWhile bath towels might not seem like the most exciting Amazon gift for men, it’s definitely one of the most essential. This luxury set got our stamp of approval in our list of the best bath towels on Amazon, and we can’t stop raving about its loop terry pattern and 10 colors to choose from.COWAY Air PurifierIn the event that he has allergies or just wants to keep the air in his space as fresh as possible, this design-friendly air purifier is just what he needs under his Christmas tree. Senior features editor Nick Mafi uses it in his space and loves its four filtration system to trap 99.999% of bacteria and debris and how it “almost looks like a fancy, sort of futuristic speaker.”Wrangler Carry-On LuggageIf he’s a jet-setter, a durable suitcase is a worthy gift for his lifestyle. The carry-on’s hard outer case can keep his contents inside protected, and the 360-degree spinner wheels can give him even more mobility as he makes his way through the airport.Victrola Vintage Bluetooth Record PlayerMusic buffs can take in their go-to tunes in classic fashion with this portable vinyl record player. (P.S.: Amazon also has a record store with official vinyls you can shop from his favorite artists.) But when he’s in the mood to stream songs, it also doubles as a bluetooth speaker with its built-in audio system.Vorspack Toiletry BagWhether left in his bathroom or taken on the go, he can keep all of his must-have toiletries organized with this dopp kit’s several exterior and interior pockets. Its water-resistant build is a major plus to keep it in its best condition.Gillette Labs Heated Razor Gold EditionInstead of trekking to the barbershop for that hot towel shave, he can recreate the experience from home with Gilette’s heated razor. It’s made to heat up in just about one second and remain waterproof for added safety when shaving at the sink.Lodge Store Inch Cast Iron Pre-Seasoned SkilletIt’s the piece of cookware that (literally) never gets old. Lodge’s cast-iron skillet is pre-seasoned to prevent rusting and is durable enough for stovetop, oven, grill, and campfire use.Bartender Kit by Modern MixologyIf he’s ready to take his bartending talents up a notch, this cocktail shaker set comes with all of the essentials (think strainer, bottle opener, and more) to nail his signature drink. There are even included recipe cards to try out a new concoction.Trigger Point Performance Nano Foot Roller MassagerGreat for runners, this vibrant foot roller will ease the aches and pains he gets after his long runs without sacrificing style in his space.Bearaby Weighted BlanketHelp him catch some z’s each night with this cozy weighted blanket, which is designed to help him relax into slumber. Unlike other weighted blankets you’ll see in the market, this one is made of sustainable ingredients and is hand-knitted to offer even weight distribution and breathability for an even more calming sleep.Titleist TruFeel Golf Balls (Set of 12)For the guy who’s always gearing up for his next day on the green, this set of best-selling golf balls will feel like a hole-in-one gift. These are made for long-distance plays and for golfers who like a soft feel when putting.The Trio of Knives by MaterialThere are at least a few types of knives any cook’s kitchen needs: a chef’s knife, serrated knife, and paring knife. This Material set checks off all the boxes, plus more, thanks to their sharp Japanese stainless steel blades for precise slicing and dicing and ergonomic handles for easy holding.Joomra Pillow SlippersWhether used as house shoes or as everyday footwear, these slides are a versatile pick for men who like to feel light on their feet. They have a featherweight design and a non-slip build to help him keep his footing on the daily.
html:
The truth is, shopping for the best last-minute Amazon gifts for men gets a bad rap. As an online destination with what feels like every item under the sun, many shoppers can be left wondering what unique gifts there could possibly be for the guys in their lives. And for those browsing at the eleventh hour, it might seem even harder to find something special that’ll deliver before holiday get-togethers. We’re here to change these narratives. Our curated list of Amazon gifts features luxe finds like designer fashion for men with expensive taste, editor-approved presents for the design enthusiasts in your family or friend group, and everything in-between. What’s more, you can get all of the above delivered in quick fashion, if you’re one of the many with an Amazon Prime membership.

Scroll below for our gift guide on the 79 best last-minute Amazon gifts for men that’ll arrive in the nick of time.

Our Top Picks:

  • Best Christmas Gift: Hugo Boss “Number One” Eau de Toilette, $80
  • Best Design-Forward Gift: Hisense 55-Inch Canvas TV, $798
  • Best White Elephant Gift: Galison Frank Lloyd Wright Geometric Artwork Puzzle, $19
  • Best Luxury Gift: Giuseppe Zanotti Ludhovic Leather Boots, $895
  • Best Self-Care Gift: Bevel Skin Care Set, $41
  • Best Fitness Gift: Bowflex Adjustable Dumbbells, $399
  • Best Foodie Gift: Made In Enameled Cast Iron Dutch Oven, $249
  • Best Tech Gift: Apple AirPods, $169
  • Best Birthday Gift: Kanars Whiskey Glasses, $36

Galison Frank Lloyd Wright 500-Piece Book Box Puzzle

Immerse him in the world of art by challenging him to complete this 500-piece Frank Lloyd Wright geometric artwork. Not to mention it makes a great white elephant gift for design enthusiasts.

Apple AirPods 4

AirPods are a classic gift that’ll keep on giving for someone who is always on the go—especially if he’s prone to losing them, an extra set will be much appreciated. Thanks to noise-cancelling technology, he can block out background noise as he listens to his favorite music and podcasts. Plus, people can listen uninterrupted for five hours straight on a full charge and for 30 hours with the case.

Bartesian Cocktail Making Machine

Rather than making a drink the old-fashioned (pun intended) way, this cocktail maker will whip it up, stat. Like a pod for a Keurig coffee maker, all he has to do is add a cocktail capsule into this device, select a strength, and press “mix.” P.S. This useful gift will come in handy for an at-home happy hour this holiday season.

Alpha Grillers Instant Read Meat Thermometer

The perfect gift for the person whose time is best spent over the grill, this meat thermometer will ensure their food is thoroughly cooked with a temperature reading in just three seconds.

UGG Men's South Bay Low Sneaker

Turn to classic sneakers for gifting. To our surprise, Ugg has a whole assortment of them, like this sleek pair with a leather upper and suede overlays that can be dressed up or down.

Mirakel Neck Massager with Heat

A deep tissue massage will be just moments away when he uses this electric back and neck massager. Designed to deliver ultimate rest and relaxation, it moves in two directions, has three speed modes, and includes a built-in heat function for a customizable treatment.

AeroGarden Harvest 2.0 Indoor Garden

Green thumbs will get a kick out of this countertop garden. It’s powered with an LED light and watering system that’ll allow him to grow up to six different plants—from veggies to herbs year-round.

POLO RALPH LAUREN Crew Socks (Pack of 3)

Now that the holiday season is here, it’s time to quickly round up the stocking stuffers that make A+ presents. One practical idea is this pair of Polo Ralph Lauren crew-length socks. Even though they’re lightweight, they have a warm, soft feel to keep the recipient comfortable year-round.

Giuseppe Zanotti Ludhovic Boots

Psst: For those who don’t already know, Amazon is chock-full of luxury fashion to shop. Tucked away in this hidden storefront is this modern pair of Giuseppe Zanotti leather boots that’ll upgrade his footwear game all winter.

All-Clad D3 Cookware Set (7 Piece)

If his cookware set is looking a little worse for wear, he can try out this All-Clad stainless steel assortment for size. Complete with fry pans, stockpots, and more, it’s a great gift for foodies to make a full-course meal. Plus, its high-quality three-ply construction is oven-safe up to 600 degrees Fahrenheit for a warp-resistant finish.

Ember Smart Cup

Odds are he’s not a fan of the room temperature coffee he intended to drink hours beforehand (who is?). This sleek Ember cup can keep his java at the same hot temperature (between 120 to 145 degrees Fahrenheit) for up to 90 minutes at a time or all day long when it’s set on its charging coaster.

Hugo Boss Fougère Cologne

This Hugo Boss fragrance has the makings for his new signature scent. A blend between nutmeg, cardamom, patchouli, and sandalwood gives it a fresh and vibrant aroma.

Made In Enameled Cast Iron Dutch Oven

Foodies can make their signature dish for years to come with the help of this heirloom-worthy Dutch oven. The enameled cast-iron cookware is designed with strong heat retention and even circulation in mind to help make stews and tender meats to perfection.

Herschel Novel Duffel Bag

Calling all jet-setters: This duffel bag will carry him from one destination to the next with ease thanks to its versatile straps and built-in shoe compartment. This earns bonus points in our book for its eco-conscious build, with its fabric made entirely of recycled water bottles.

Apple Watch Series 9 [GPS + Cellular 41mm]

If you’re in search of a smartwatch with all the best bells and whistles for him, turn your attention to this Apple Series 9 watch. Its S9 chip gives it one of the brightest, fastest displays. He can track his wellness with built-in sensors designed to report on his physical and mental health. Plus, he can make calls and send messages without having his phone handy.

Theragun Prime Plus

Aches and pains are bound to creep up, especially if he’s a fitness fanatic. This massage gun can help relieve them with its rotating percussion arm and ergonomic grip for personalized muscle treatments.

KODAK Mini Shot Retro 4PASS Instant Digital Camera & Photo Printer

Lights, camera, action: He’ll capture every moment in an instant with this digital polaroid camera. It comes with over 60 cartridge sheets to create unique prints he’ll cherish.

Yeti Hopper M Series Backpack Cooler

Outdoorsy types can take this Yeti cooler backpack on all of their adventures. It’s spacious enough to hold nearly 20 cans at a time and it’s built with strong insulation to keep items at temperature for hours on end.

Kanars Old Fashioned Whiskey Glasses (Set of 4)

Whether he enjoys a mixed drink or bourbon on the rocks, these whiskey glasses will be a welcome gift. Available in a set of four, he can toast with his favorite people and keep the glasses protected in the gift box when they’re not in use.

Ooni Volt Indoor & Outdoor Pizza Oven

For the guy who can’t go without a fresh slice, help him transform his kitchen into a personal pizzeria with this electric pizza oven on his countertop. The gadget is manufactured to heat to 850 degrees Fahrenheit in about 20 minutes and make a fresh pie in just over a minute.

Vilebrequin Linen Shirt

He can’t go wrong with a simple button-down, and this luxe linen shirt is proof. Designed by Vilebrequin, this long-sleeve is made to take him back in time to evoke the spirit of 1971 St. Tropez.

Beats Pill Portable Bluetooth Speaker

Compact and perfectly portable, this Beats Bluetooth speaker includes a lanyard so he can easily carry it around. It’s compatible with Apple and Android devices for simple pairing, and thanks to its 24-hour battery life, he can also enjoy all-day music play.

Bevel Skin Care Set

Here’s a skin-care set that’ll help him invest in his self-care routine day in and day out. Bevel’s collection of face and beard wash, face gel, and exfoliating pads are all formulated with nourishing ingredients like aloe vera and vitamin C specifically to care for men’s skin. The brand notes that each product is well-suited for all skin types to help remedy common issues like bumps and discoloration.

Courant Catch:3 Wireless Phone Charging Tray

Elevate his at-home charging station with this sleek wireless charger, available in leather and linen. It’s compatible with a range of devices like Apple, Android, Google, and LG and features a catchall design to help hold other must-haves like his glasses.

Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle

When it comes to shopping for a water bottle, Owala should be at the top of your list. The brand is popular for its dozens of colors to choose from, built-in straw, and double-wall insulation designed to keep drinks cold for nearly 24 hours.

BowFlex SelectTech 552 Adjustable Dumbbells

For the guy who loves staying active, add versatility to his workout with these adjustable dumbbells. With the simple turn of the dial, he can adjust the weight of the dumbbells from 5 to 52 pounds to tackle strength training.

Norelco Philips Multi Groomer All-in-One Trimmer

Grooming just got a whole lot easier: This all-in-one trimmer kit has 13 pieces made to cut his facial and ear hair, as well as the hair, you know, on his head. The self-sharpening blades won’t require blade oil to maintain their quality, and the hour-long battery life can help him trim continuously.

Amazon eGift Card

Don’t underestimate the power of a good gift card. Men who like shopping for themselves will appreciate this digital Amazon gift card they can spend with abandon. Added perk: Amazon gift cards never expire, so he can take his time picking out everything he wants to buy on the mega-retailer.

Calvin Klein Cotton Classics V Neck T-Shirt (Set of 3)

Here’s a set of T-shirts that’ll always be in style. This Calvin Klein three-pack is made with a cool V-neck silhouette and breathable cotton material for comfortable yet stylish all-day wear.

Brooklinen Super Plush Robe

Instead of booking a spa day, he can sport this plush Brooklinen robe to enjoy ultimate comfort from home. Features like wide adjustable cuffs and a tie belt will help him customize his fit as he unwinds.

Netvue by Birdfy Smart Bird Feeder

Is he ready to take his bird-watching hobby to new heights? This solar-powered smart bird feeder is equipped with a camera that can identify nearly 6,000 species that fly by and deliver shots and videos of them to his smartphone.

D.S. & Durga Big Sur After Rain Candle

With the lighting of this wick, he’ll be transported to the West Coast with scents reminiscent of Big Sur after a rain shower. Think notes of eucalyptus leaf, wet wood, and magnolia.

Alessi Pulcina Stovetop Coffee Maker

Coffee-shop-level brews will be at his fingertips with this stunning espresso maker. Not only is the boiler manufactured to make espresso just right, but its aesthetically pleasing build also makes it a standout in any design-enthusiast’s kitchen.

Driftaway Coffee Explorer Box, 5 Pack Coffee Tasting Kit

Speaking of coffee, he can enjoy an assortment between light and dark roasts to kickstart his day, courtesy of Driftaway Coffee. The tasting pack includes five packs of whole fresh-roasted beans, all with hidden labels for an authentic tasting experience.

Smeg 2 Slice Toaster

This trendy toaster merges form and function to make his breakfast spread.

Fellow Stagg EKG Electric Gooseneck Kettle

Tea time: This Fellow electric kettle is designed to heat water to an exact temperature degree and has an ergonomic spout that allows for precise pours. He can steep his tea or create a next-level cup of pour-over coffee to his liking.

Ray-Ban RB3016 Clubmaster Square Sunglasses

A cool pair of sunglasses are essential in any guy’s arsenal of accessories. Case in point: These Ray-Bans. Their slightly square shape and dozen-plus frame and lens colors speak to Old Hollywood style that can easily elevate any look.

Hisense 55-Inch Class QLED 4K S7N CanvasTV

Who said home technology can’t be decor? This Canvas TV delivers the best of both worlds, as it works as a standard TV to stream your favorite movies and shows and a high-end art display when used in art mode.

Arcade1Up PAC-Man Plus Deluxe Arcade Machine

With 14 classic games, like Pac-Man and Galaga, the lifelong gamer in your life is set to create an arcade from home with this console. They can battle it out with gamers around the world with access to Wi-Fi leaderboards.

Dyson OnTrac Over Ear Wireless Headphones

Dyson might be known for everything from its powerful cordless vacuums to hair-styling tools, but its cool over-ear headphones are just as worth the hype. They boast eight noise-cancelling microphones (just double tap the outer cap to block out unwanted sounds) and up to 55 hours straight of music-listening on a full charge.

INIU Slim Portable Charger

Built for Android or iPhone, this slim portable charger is designed to keep his devices charged when he’s en route to his next stop. In fact, the manufacturer notes that it can charge batteries nearly 80% in one hour.

iRobot Roomba Vacuum 2 Essential Robot

This cordless robot vacuum will be a life saver for the guys who always put cleaning at the end of their to-do lists. It’s made to do all the heavy lifting for him by mapping out his space with built-in sensors for its cleaning navigation. Thanks to the compact profile, the vacuum can get in hard-to-reach places and powerfully clean carpets and hard floors with its three-stage system.

Amazon Kindle Paperwhite (16 GB)

Here’s a gift bookworms will consider a treat. Thanks to its lightweight build, the new Amazon Kindle will allow them to read all of their favorite novels without the hassle of lugging them all around. It’s also designed to turn pages 25% faster than standard Kindles and has a glare-free display no matter the lighting.

Truff Gourmet Hot Sauce Sampler Pack

As the saying goes, variety is the spice of life. Make this a reality when you give him these hot sauces infused with ripe chili peppers, agave nectar, and black and white truffles.

Carhartt Men's Knit Cuffed Beanie

Bad hair day? No problem. This beanie will disguise his do and keep him warm with its knit material this winter.

Alpha Industries MA-1 Bomber Flight Jacket

He can layer up in style this season with this bomber jacket. It’s packed with plenty of pockets to keep his essentials handy and five neutral colors to fit in his closet.

The GO-to Plain Toe Oxford by Cole Haan

This classic pair of Oxford shoes doesn't skimp on comfort. He can take on the day with the EVA midsole designed to give each step strong cushioning.

Loftie Alarm Clock

Rise and shine: The Loftie alarm clock is an AD-favorite, and we’re confident it’ll be his favorite soon too. It’s equipped with a dimmable display, nightlight, two-phase alarm, and custom content like guided meditations that can play on the device.

Scotch Porter Conditioning Beard Balm and Beard Conditioner

Men with beards can keep their facial hair moisturized and hydrated with the help of this balm and conditioner duo. Backed with nourishing ingredients like aloe vera and shea butter, this beard care kit is also formulated with inviting notes like musk and amber so his facial hair will feel as good as it smells.

Brightland The Artist Capsule

Men who love experimenting with new ingredients can take their pick from a variety of cold-pressed olive oils: Ardor, Rosette, Lucid, and Arise. Each one is made with olives grown on small California-based family farms and include a variety of standout flavors like chili and basil.

Apple AirTag

For all of the forgetful guys in your life, an Apple AirTag will help them track down their lost items. Its one-tap setup can allow him to connect an AirTag to his iPhone or iPad effortlessly and use the Find My app to find his belongings.

ASNEY Upgraded Magnetic Chess Set

Sure, there are plenty of game systems on the market, but few can beat the classics like chess. This set will make gaming even easier with the magnetic board and pieces to keep them from shifting during play. Added bonus: The board is foldable and comes with slots to stash pieces for streamlined storage.

Blackstone 1883 Original Griddle

Whether it’s Father’s Day or tailgating season, this Blackstone griddle will help him make some of his favorite BBQ recipes with ease. Its surface is spacious enough to make nearly 20 burgers at a time, and its add-ons like side shelves will store his seasonings and keep grill tools within arm’s reach.

Whiskey Chilling Stones (Set of 6) by R.O.C.K.S.

In the eyes of a whiskey enthusiast, there are probably few things worse than a watered down drink. He’ll keep his bourbon cold with these chilling stones without impacting its flavor.

Our Place Wonder Oven

Sometimes kitchen appliances can be an eyesore, but that’s not the case with Our Place’s toaster oven. He can add design appeal to his space while taking a hands-off approach to cooking with its six included presets: air frying, toasting, roasting, baking, reheating, and broiling.

Jack Black Clean & Cool Body Set

Even if his self-care routine simply consists of taking a long shower after a tiring day, it’ll be all the more soothing when you gift him Jack Black’s cool and clean body-care set. It includes a body wash that’s formulated for use from head to toe, as well as body lotion and deodorant, all filled with crisp scents.

Peloton Indoor Exercise Bike

Another great way to ramp up his fitness journey, the Peloton bike offers an all-access membership ($44/mo) to tune into classes geared towards his exercise goals. Or he can tackle workouts on his own while using the bike to stream shows, live sports, and more with Peloton Entertainment.

Solo Stove Bonfire 2.0 with Stand

With the temperatures dropping outside, a personal bonfire will be a treat to enjoy the great outdoors with friends and family. This one is smoke-free, so he can focus on enjoying the flames instead of tending to excessive ashes blowing around. We’re not mad at its stainless-steel build that’ll help it mesh in nearly any modern outdoor setup.

Architectural Digest at 100: A Century of Style

What’s a gift guide from AD without our coffee table book to help him reenvision his own space? In this look into the last 100 years of style, he’ll get endless inspiration from the homes of some of the world’s most private celebrities, like Barack and Michelle Obama, David Bowie, and Diana Vreeland, and take a peek into the works of industry-leading designers and architects like Frank Lloyd Wright and India Mahdavi.

Ninja BN401 Nutri Pro Compact Personal Blender

From delicious juices to smoothies, this personal blender is powerful enough to make all of the above. Great for guys who are constantly on the move, the blending bowl doubles as a cup to take on the go.

Buffy 100% Eucalyptus Lyocell Duvet Cover

A cozy night’s rest is just moments away, as this eucalyptus duvet cover is made to feel soft and breathable to the touch. It’s eco-conscious all the way down to the dyes to make it, including natural ingredients like turmeric and rose petals.

HOTO Electric Screwdriver Tool Set

With must-haves like pliers and screwdrivers, these tools are a gift set that would be especially helpful for someone who just moved into a new house. Its minimalist design is made to blend in with the rest of his home essentials so it’d make a perfect housewarming gift.

Frigidaire Retro Mini Fridge Cooler

This mini fridge will be a much-appreciated gift in his den for a couple of reasons. One: It's big enough to hold about six cans at a time. Two: Its retro design will add a vintage touch to his space.

Leather Journal Gift Set

Even in the age of digital media, there’s nothing quite like putting your thoughts down on paper. If the man in your life knows the feeling, gift him this leather notebook so he can journal and jot down his everyday tasks.

MVMT Men’s Watch

If he likes to keep track of time the old-fashioned way but he also likes modern style, we’re here to present this elevated watch. It keeps track of time by hour, minute, and second hands while delivering contemporary flare with its slim, minimalist design.

Serman Brands Front Pocket Wallet

Wallets are something we use all the time but hardly ever replace. If he can relate, give him this minimalist leather wallet that comes with front and interior pockets and a money clip for easy access to cash and cards.

Texere Bath Towel Set

While bath towels might not seem like the most exciting Amazon gift for men, it’s definitely one of the most essential. This luxury set got our stamp of approval in our list of the best bath towels on Amazon, and we can’t stop raving about its loop terry pattern and 10 colors to choose from.

COWAY Air Purifier

In the event that he has allergies or just wants to keep the air in his space as fresh as possible, this design-friendly air purifier is just what he needs under his Christmas tree. Senior features editor Nick Mafi uses it in his space and loves its four filtration system to trap 99.999% of bacteria and debris and how it “almost looks like a fancy, sort of futuristic speaker.”

Wrangler Carry-On Luggage

If he’s a jet-setter, a durable suitcase is a worthy gift for his lifestyle. The carry-on’s hard outer case can keep his contents inside protected, and the 360-degree spinner wheels can give him even more mobility as he makes his way through the airport.

Victrola Vintage Bluetooth Record Player

Music buffs can take in their go-to tunes in classic fashion with this portable vinyl record player. (P.S.: Amazon also has a record store with official vinyls you can shop from his favorite artists.) But when he’s in the mood to stream songs, it also doubles as a bluetooth speaker with its built-in audio system.

Vorspack Toiletry Bag

Whether left in his bathroom or taken on the go, he can keep all of his must-have toiletries organized with this dopp kit’s several exterior and interior pockets. Its water-resistant build is a major plus to keep it in its best condition.

Gillette Labs Heated Razor Gold Edition

Instead of trekking to the barbershop for that hot towel shave, he can recreate the experience from home with Gilette’s heated razor. It’s made to heat up in just about one second and remain waterproof for added safety when shaving at the sink.

Lodge Store Inch Cast Iron Pre-Seasoned Skillet

It’s the piece of cookware that (literally) never gets old. Lodge’s cast-iron skillet is pre-seasoned to prevent rusting and is durable enough for stovetop, oven, grill, and campfire use.

Bartender Kit by Modern Mixology

If he’s ready to take his bartending talents up a notch, this cocktail shaker set comes with all of the essentials (think strainer, bottle opener, and more) to nail his signature drink. There are even included recipe cards to try out a new concoction.

Trigger Point Performance Nano Foot Roller Massager

Great for runners, this vibrant foot roller will ease the aches and pains he gets after his long runs without sacrificing style in his space.

Bearaby Weighted Blanket

Help him catch some z’s each night with this cozy weighted blanket, which is designed to help him relax into slumber. Unlike other weighted blankets you’ll see in the market, this one is made of sustainable ingredients and is hand-knitted to offer even weight distribution and breathability for an even more calming sleep.

Titleist TruFeel Golf Balls (Set of 12)

For the guy who’s always gearing up for his next day on the green, this set of best-selling golf balls will feel like a hole-in-one gift. These are made for long-distance plays and for golfers who like a soft feel when putting.

The Trio of Knives by Material

There are at least a few types of knives any cook’s kitchen needs: a chef’s knife, serrated knife, and paring knife. This Material set checks off all the boxes, plus more, thanks to their sharp Japanese stainless steel blades for precise slicing and dicing and ergonomic handles for easy holding.

Joomra Pillow Slippers

Whether used as house shoes or as everyday footwear, these slides are a versatile pick for men who like to feel light on their feet. They have a featherweight design and a non-slip build to help him keep his footing on the daily.
